characters.story: "JYAO!" the flesh sings cheerfully - gum, glue and adhesive!
"MYOH!" the words and kiddie cocktail command sharply - wrong, absurd and ridiculous!
"LYAO?" the house questions curiously - is it deserted, sparse and desolate?
"BAN!" the highlander sings cheerfully between two balls - a speck, spot and mottled!
"WUN?" the thread questions curiously - what's the design, pattern and texture?
The metal bends down drooping - a small shovel, spade to dig!
"SAH!" the flowers command sharply - Samoa, the name and island!
The flesh bends down drooping - the backbone, spine and vertebrae!
"HAN?" the snare, sparkler and pit question curiously - is this a letter, a correspondence message?
"HAN?" the water questions curiously - a culvert for forgiveness and tolerance?
"YING!" the sun commands sharply - to reflect, image like a mirror and project!
"YAHNG!" the bones and center sing cheerfully despite calamity, disaster and misfortune!
"FAY?" the flesh questions curiously - is it plump, fat and chubby?
"PAH?" he questions curiously - will you crawl, creep and climb?
"BAH!" the sickness sings cheerfully - a scar, a wound mark representing life!
"YEN!" she commands sharply - gorgeous, beautiful with a romantic encounter!
"TYEN?" the tongue questions curiously - is it sugary, sweet like dessert?
"CHYEN?" the metal and wicker basket question curiously - are these pliers, tongs and clamp?
